user_stories.title: Define AmbiguousIdError type
acceptance_criteria: AmbiguousIdError class exists in src/errors.ts
AmbiguousIdError extends WreckitError
AmbiguousIdError takes input string and matches array
Error message lists all matching IDs
Error code is 'AMBIGUOUS_ID'

user_stories.title: Implement three-tier ID resolution logic
acceptance_criteria: resolveId supports exact full ID match
resolveId supports numeric prefix match (e.g. '1' matches '001-...')
resolveId supports slug suffix match
Resolution follows priority: Exact > Numeric > Slug
numeric match handles zero-padding correctly

user_stories.title: Implement ambiguity detection and error reporting
acceptance_criteria: resolveId detects multiple matches at the numeric prefix tier
resolveId detects multiple matches at the slug suffix tier
Ambiguous matches throw AmbiguousIdError
AmbiguousIdError contains list of all candidates
Single match returns the full ID string

user_stories.title: Update and expand ID resolution tests
acceptance_criteria: Tests cover exact match success
Tests cover unique numeric prefix success
Tests cover unique slug suffix success
Tests verify AmbiguousIdError for duplicate numeric prefixes
Tests verify AmbiguousIdError for duplicate slug suffixes
Tests verify resolution priority order
